title: 12/31/20 – HOUR 3 – Has The NBA Become Unwatchable? PLUS, Kurt Helin!
itunes:title: 12/31/20 – HOUR 3 – Has The NBA Become Unwatchable? PLUS, Kurt Helin!
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker fill in for Dan Patrick and talk about a glaring problem with the NBA through the first couple weeks of the season. They speak with NBC Sports’ Kurt Helin about what the NBA can do to fix their ratings issue and which teams have impressed him thus far. Finally, the guys share how they will remember the most unique year in sports!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
